title: Forgot your password?
descriptionBlockOne: Enter the email address you used when you joined and we will send you instructions on how to reset your password.
descriptionBlockTwo: For security reasons, we do NOT store your password, so you can be sure that we will never send you your password by e-mail.

success.title: Email Sent!
success.description: We have sent an email with instructions to reset your password.

error.title: Error!
error.description: We could not find an account with that email address.

loading.title: Loading...
loading.description: We are sending an email with instructions to reset your password.
